column4: how can i check my ip in ubuntu.. not the one for my home but the one behind network.. the 192.168....
make a folder in your homedir named public_html and put stuff there (make it readable by www-data)
Because you can put stuff in that folder as your own user, without having to deal with permission issues inside of www-data
Make /var/www owned by www-data:www-data, add yourself to the www-data group, and then add writing to group permissions
